name: ListTemplateJobs
description:
Retrieve jobs associated with a specific document template.

Use this tool to get a list of all user jobs linked to a particular document generation template by providing the template ID.

parameters.name: template_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the template for which jobs need to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: Id of template to fetch jobs for.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the starting position for pagination. Requires 'usemarker' to be set to true.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page from the list of jobs.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: Id of template to fetch jobs for.

value_schema.description: Id of template to fetch jobs for.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
